STEPS TO BOOKING

Click the button below to get started.

Schedule Appointment Now!
1
Check "I'm a new patient at this practice". Choose "1hr - New Patient Appointment."
2
Select "Virtual Visit."
3
Select an available date and time (Eastern Time).
4
Enter your contact, insurance, and payment details. Have your ID and insurance card ready to upload.
5
Watch for an email confirmation. It contains the video-visit link and your intake formâ€”please complete it at least 24 hours before the appointment.

BEFORE YOUR VISIT

Fill out your new patient intake form.
Test your camera, microphone, and internet connection. See help center for detailed instructions.
Reschedule or cancel with the link in your email at least 24 hours ahead to avoid fees.
All data is encrypted & HIPAA-compliant via Tebra.
